The Smurfs team up with their human friends to rescue Smurfette, who has been kidnapped by Gargamel since she knows a secret spell that can turn the evil sorcerer's newest creation - creatures called the Naughties - into real Smurfs.

 E N C O D E R S . N O T E S . . .

               AUDiO: The DOGZ BOLLAX :wink: thanks brochacho


 SAMPLE......: Yes! duh...

 ADDED NOTE..: well here we are again, this time, all this is a re-encode of the russian release which seems to be from a spanish source. as with most cams, taken from the side, has movement this release already has someones filters being used and ben worked over.

 work that needed done, rotated, croped, bit of the ol' perspective to straighten out and level off best we can. while not a lot of noise and some decent detail, there were parts that the saturation needed some attention. brought those down, tweaked rgb & a splash of sharpness to bring back some of the detail due to the loss using a de-noiser. 

 ** reason why mostly to read nfo - - throughout the movie there are some hot spots and a few places where the whites are off the hook.you notice the worst about 3/4 of the way through. "you have been warned" -  audio is from a special friend and we are greatful for the hook up. it's amazing sounding for what it is. . .

 a very special thanx to tommiecook & 26k for the great job of the sync of audio. cheers m8's

 v/5 a/7 

 cheers to the cammer, the provider and everyone that assist in helping us bring QUALiTY - -to you all :wink:

 WORK.DONE . . .
